name: 0un

body.origin:
|- wceq(cun(emptycls, c0), c0)
-| wceq(cun(emptycls, c0), cun(c0, emptycls))
-| wceq(cun(c0, emptycls), c0)

comment: The union of the empty set with a class is itself. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
